original_title: An Officer and A Gentleman: Bull James
overview: It's that time again... to find out how someone wipes their ass and takes a leak. On this edition of "An Officer & A Gentleman" Chuck and Dan are joined by "The Last of a Dying Breed" Bull James. Find out Bull's most intimate details on this wacky episode filmed during WrestleCon 2017 weekend.
title: An Officer and A Gentleman: Bull James
